levels.description: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> and all ground enemies within the same tile as herself are put to <$ba.sleep>Sleep</>. Restores the HP of all nearby allies by <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_to_hp_recovery_ratio:0%}</> of Blemishine's ATK every second
